article.title: koha-start-sip
article.info:
Koha is the first free software library automation package.
Robin Sheat
Catalyst IT http://www.catalyst.net.nz
Author

refnamediv.refpurpose: Starts the SIP daemon for the specified Koha instances.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This will start the SIP daemon for the Koha instance specified by instancename.
If the SIP configuration is not present for the supplied instance, it will be silently skipped.
To enable SIP support for an instance, refer to koha-enable-sip(8).
